name: Akt
comment: Found in the C-terminal hydrophobic motif. Phosphorylation at this site by mTORC2 stimulates Akt activity (<a href='http://pubmed.org/15718470' target='_blank' title='Open in PubMed'>Sarbassov et al.

name: Akt
comment: Found in the activation loop of the kinase domain, and is phosphorylated by PDK1 (Alessi et al., 1997; Stephens et al., 1998; Stokoe et al., 1997). This primes Akt for a second phosphorylation (at S474) for complete activation (e.g., Humphrey et al., 2013).
